programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus
programme.desc: Rogi thinks that things happening around him haven't been unlucky. So he asks his friends how to be a lucky bus and other bus friends suggest that Genie is the lucky charm.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo The Wildlife Ranger is an animated series that fosters an awareness and appreciation of the diversity of the wildlife treasures that surrounding us and come from different nature habitat. The characters set positive examples for the target viewers.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.desc: This series follows a pony named Twilight Sparkle as she learns about friendship in the town of Ponyville with her friends.The ponies share adventures and help other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendship.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: Moth on the Moon - Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko as the heroic trio goes into the night to save the day!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Our heroes are doing research in Littleroot Town, and as usual, the results are anythingbutusual!

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: The season begins with a fun-filled, high-octane episode that brings you the Maths behind thrill rides. Joakim and Charlotte get wet and wild at Adventure Cove to show you how shapes is the key to making roller coasters safer, how the Queueing Theory can help you beat those time-wasting queues and how knowing speed, angle, weight and height can help you zip down water slides.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: It's the National Tournament Semi-Finals and tensions are running high! The underdog takes on the fan-favorite with flare while two bitter rivals get the rematch they've been training for. Each Blader has a new move up his sleeve but whose will be enough to tip the scale?

programme.title: The 94th Annual Academy Awards[International Version]
programme.desc: The 94th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, will honor the best films released since March 1, 2021.

programme.title: Natural World: Natures Miniature Miracles
programme.desc: It really is a big bad world out there. So what happens if you're the little guy? This film tells the epic survival stories of the world's smallest animals. To make a living, these tiny heroes have evolved extraordinary skills and achieved mind-boggling feats. From the animal kingdom's greatest artist to the tiny creatures that provide us with so much of the air we breathe, discover what it takes to be a miniature miracle.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S9 - Hunted
programme.desc: While Lloyd and Nya resist Emperor Garmadon's oppressive hold on Ninjago City, Young Wu and the rest of the Ninja are stranded in a barbaric realm where fierce dragons are being hunted down by Iron Baron and his gang of Dragon Hunters. Lloyd must endure in NINJAGO City, the others need to find the fabled Dragon Armor if they ever hope to get back home to stop Emperor Garmadon once and for all.

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers
programme.desc: A new team of Power Rangers must defend the Morphin Grid from Evox, an evil sentient computer virus and his evil avatar clones!

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Brain Juice
programme.desc: Brain Juice is a roving Quiz Game Show that goes from school to school to settle once and for all who is the smartest kid in class.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Tremors : A Cold Day In Hell
programme.desc: The new sequel finds Burt Gummer, who's dying from Graboid poison, and his son Travis at a remote research station in Canada's Nunavut Territory, where they must go up against a new batch of Graboids to save Burt's life.

programme.title: Incredible Tales
programme.desc: 1960, Indas a young modern Iban has been instructed to go deep into Sarawak and convert the scattered tribes that still clung to their ancient ways. He hired some of the fiercest "head-hunter" warriors of his tribe to help him accomplished for the greater good but he couldn't control his men and they ended up brutally chop off a village chieftain's head named, Paong and raped his wife, Landan. Landan prays to the spirits that they would take revenge upon Paong's death.

programme.title: Nancy Drew
programme.desc: With only hours left, the Drew Crew must race against the clock to find a way to vanquish the Agleaca before she takes what is owed to her.

programme.desc: Iz's 12th birthday isn't panning out the way he thought it might. He gets picked on by the school bully on the way to school, a video of him daydreaming goes viral and now he's deemed even more of a weirdo loser by his classmates because of his obsession with Wrestling. Then something really strange happens. He now has a new imaginary friend, Bonemasher, who might just make his life a little more challenging.

programme.title: Filly Funtasia
programme.desc: Our heroine Rose and her Filly friends embark on fun exciting adventures as they start their school life at the Royal Magic Academy of Funtasia. They soon realise that their new magic skills will be of great use, as peril is near. Ages ago, during The Dark Battle, the evil Wranglum was absorbed by the Dark Mirror into a hidden Crystal Prison, which can only be unlocked by the Dark Crystal. Rose unknowingly holds the key and does not know how much danger she is in.

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends

It's up to Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy to get RoboCat back under control. Cherry is trying to compose a song that will get her into a prestigious music competition. However, she keeps getting disturbed by a noisy frog. While trying to catch the frog, they accidentally multiply it into a gazillion frogs which overrun the town.

There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
